Visualizing genomic deletions in R

Posted on January 15, 2018

Recently I've been studying about identifying structural variants using short NGS reads. I don't want to go into detail about structural variants (for more information you can read the [Wikipedia page](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Structural_variation)), but I want to briefly show how you can visualize genomic deletions in R with short reads.
